sentence: And some of Trump's chosen candidates were there as well - including Max Miller of Ohio, who is vying to replace the retiring GOP Rep. Anthony Gonzalez, an impeachment backer, and Kelly Tshibaka, taking on Republican Sen. Lisa Murkowski, who said Trump should be convicted for inciting an insurrection.
title: 'The real problem is that our leaders are dumb': Trump blasts Biden over Putin's invasion of Ukraine boasting that it wouldn't have happened on his watch - as he teases a 2024 run

author: Deneen Borelli
title: Biden Blunders on the World Stage

sentence: Gibbs faced primary challenges from multiple candidates including Max Miller, who served as a White House aide to former President Donald Trump.
author: Daniel Uria
title: Ohio Rep. Bob Gibbs announces retirement citing redistricting 'circus'

sentence: — Max Miller (@MaxMillerOH) April 6, 2022 Former President Donald Trump released the following statement on Gibbs’ retirement: “I want to congratulate Congressman Bob Gibbs of Ohio on a wonderful and accomplished career.

title: BREAKING: Republican Rep announces retirement, slams redistricting ‘circus’ [Trump responds]
